title: RAG and Evaluations
description: An experimental autonomous RAG system evaluated with RAGAS framework on HotPotQA dataset. Demonstrates strong grounding behavior with identified improvement areas in context recall consistency and answer synthesis capabilities.

title: Vector DB Explorer
description: A vector database instance with an interface to ingest data for chunking and embedding, plot vectors, and execute keyword-match or vector similarity searches.

title: Built a Neural Network from Scratch for Classification
description: Built a neural network from scratch and used it to solve a classification problem after fine-tuning its hyperparameters! For model implementation I only used numpy and learned immensely. After this project I have significantly improved confidence because now I know better on how the underlying mechanism works in addition to operating it well.

title: AgentCon - Pizza Ordering Agent Workshop
description: Built an agent that uses instructions, RAG, tool calling, MCP server integration to order a pizza from a hypothetical pizza store with a real API endpoint.

title: Time Series Forecasting for Mobi Bike Data
description: This notebook establishes and validates a robust, production-ready SARIMA model by effectively isolating complex patterns and reducing residuals to white noise; the tool is ready for retraining and deployment to support Mobi's 2026 strategy.

title: Google 5-Day AI Agents Intensive Course Capstone: Onboarding Agent
description: This is an agentic onboarding system that adds an alternative to legacy registration forms, and allows users to register to a system with a natural conversation. The agent sits behind a regular API, helps generate chat messages and triggers API endpoint calls as tool calls based on the nature of the conversation.

title: Customer Segmentation and Targeted Marketing Strategy
description: Developed a customer segmentation model to categorize customers into distinct groups based on their purchasing behavior and personal characteristics. Used this model to recommend targeted marketing strategies for a retail company.

title: Looker Dashboard: Customer Churn Segmentation Results
description: I used Looker to visualize the results of my earlier customer segmentation efforts as part of my coursework. Learned the ropes on Looker and feeling confident on building to solve business problems.

title: Tableau Dashboard: Profitability Overview
description: I used Tableau to create this dashboard allowing various overview of the orders of this superstore data with dynamic filters and visuals to help monitoring and decision making.

title: Tableau Dashboard Stories: Profitability Over 4 Years and Sub Product Categories
description: I used Tableau to create dashboards and used them to generate data stories to reveal actionable insight for this superstore data on KPIs over 4 years and product sub-category profitabilities.

title: Cloud Data Movements and Visualization
description: This project aims to demonstrate building end to end data pipelines. Starting from the point of recording the data, I move the data between different cloud services, and visualized it. The goal of this project is to demonstrate usage of various services.

title: Mall Customers Segmentation
description: Applied unsupervised ML modeling to the Mall Customers dataset to uncover data-driven personas to guide potential decisions. Ran a full Python workflowâ€”EDA, outlier removal, feature scaling, elbow method and silhouette analysis to select appropriate k value, built a K-Means clustering model and a reproducable notebook with mainly pandas and scikit-learn.

title: HmmSpeak
description: A language learning app helping people practice speaking in person with a partner. The prototype app listens to the conversation in real time, transcribes it, builds a conversation context and provides suggestions based on the dialogue. Users should continue their dialogue unless they get stuck and need suggestions to continue the conversation. Developed while participating to the Build Your AI App in 6 Weeks program of Vancouver AI Meetup (VAM)

title: Cloud Gourmet (Database Design)
description: Database design for a Cloud Gourmet meal kit subscription service. The database allows managing customer information, meal preferences, subscription plans, deliveries, discounts, and is open for extension.

title:
Book Cafe 
 (Database Design)
description: Database design for a Book Cafe service. The database allows managing customer information, book inventory, orders, suppliers and contracts.

title: Healthy Life Clinic (Database Design)
description: Database design for a Healthy Life Clinic service. The database allows managing patient information, doctor information, appointments.

title: SQL Data Pull Strategy
description: Strategy pattern implementation that is open to extension and allows pulling data from multiple SQL databases dynamically.

title: Talk With Your Files
description: Early adopter Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) implementation with file upload support and adjustable parameters.
